talentList.name: Arcane Subtlety
talentList.description: Reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by v0 and reduces threat of Arcane spells by v1%.

talentList.name: Arcane Concentration
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage	spell by 100%.

talentList.name: Arcane Focus
talentList.description: Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Arcane Mind
talentList.description: Increases your total Intellect by v0%.

talentList.name: Wand Specialization
talentList.description: Increases your damage with Wands by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Arcane Missiles
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.

talentList.name: Arcane Impact
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Explosion and Arcane Blast spells by an additional v0%.

talentList.name: Magic Attunement
talentList.description: Increases the effect of your Amplify Magic and Dampen Magic spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Mana Shield
talentList.description: Decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by v0%.

talentList.name: Arcane Fortitude
talentList.description: Increases your armor by an amount equal to 100% of your Intellect.

talentList.name: Presence of Mind
talentList.description: When activated, your next Mage spell with a casting time less than 10 sec becomes an instant cast spell.

talentList.name: Arcane Power
talentList.description: When activated, your spells deal 30% more damage while costing 30% more mana to cast. This effect lasts 15 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Counterspell
talentList.description: Gives your Counterspell a v0% chance to silence the target for 4 sec.

talentList.name: Arcane Instability
talentList.description: Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by v0%.

talentList.name: Arcane Meditation
talentList.description: Allows v0% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

talentList.name: Magic Absorption
talentList.description: Increases all resistances by v0 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore v1% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.

talentList.name: Improved Blink
talentList.description: For 4 sec after casting Blink, your chance to be hit by all attacks and spells is reduced by v0%.

talentList.name: Prismatic Cloak
talentList.description: Reduces all damage taken by v0%.

talentList.name: Arcane Potency
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of any spell cast while Clearcasting by v0%.

talentList.name: Empowered Arcane Missiles
talentList.description: Your Arcane Missiles spell gains an additional v0% of your bonus spell damage effects, but mana cost is increased by v1%.

talentList.name: Spell Power
talentList.description: Increases critical strike damage bonus of all spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Mind Mastery
talentList.description: Increases spell damage by up to v0% of your total intellect.

talentList.name: Slow
talentList.description: Reduces target's movement speed by 50%, increases the time between ranged attacks by 50% and increases casting time by 50%. Lasts 15 sec. Slow can only affect one target at a time.

talentList.name: Burning Soul
talentList.description: Gives your Fire spells a v0% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage and reduces the threat caused by your Fire spells by v1%.

talentList.name: Molten Shields
talentList.description: Causes your Fire Ward to have a v0% chance to reflect Fire spells while active. In addition, your Molten Armor has a v1% chance to affect ranged and spell attacks.

talentList.name: Improved Scorch
talentList.description: Your Scorch spells have a v0% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Fire damage. This vulnerability increases the Fire damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 30 sec.  Stacks up to 5 times.

talentList.name: Improved Fireball
talentList.description: Reduces the casting time of your Fireball spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Fire Blast
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Blast spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Flame Throwing
talentList.description: Increases the range of your fire spells by v0 yards.

talentList.name: Pyroblast
talentList.description: Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 148 to 195 Fire damage and an additional 56 Fire damage over 12 sec.

talentList.name: Impact
talentList.description: Gives your Fire spells a v0% chance to stun the target for 2 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Flamestrike
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Flamestrike spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Blast Wave
talentList.description: A wave of flame radiates outward from the caster, damaging all enemies caught within the blast for 616 to 724 Fire damage, and dazing them for 6 sec.

talentList.name: Critical Mass
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your fire spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Ignite
talentList.description: Your critical strikes from Fire damage spells cause the target to burn for an additional v0% of your spell's damage over 4 sec.

talentList.name: Fire Power
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your fire spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Combustion
talentList.description: When activated, this spell causes each of your Fire damage spell hits to increase your critical strike chance with Fire damage spells by 10%. This effect lasts until you have caused 3 critical strikes with Fire spells.

talentList.name: Incineration
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire Blast and Scorch spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Master of Elements
talentList.description: Your Fire and Frost spell criticals will refund v0% of their base mana cost.

talentList.name: Playing with Fire
talentList.description: Increases all spell damage caused by v0% and all spell damage taken by v1%.

talentList.name: Blazing Speed
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance when hit by a melee or ranged attack to increase your movement speed by 50% and dispel all movement impairing effects. This effect lasts 8 sec.

talentList.name: Pyromaniac
talentList.description: Increases chance to critically hit and reduces the mana cost of all Fire spells by an additional v0%.

talentList.name: Molten Fury
talentList.description: Increases damage of all spells against targets with less than 20% health by v0%.

talentList.name: Empowered Fireball
talentList.description: Your Fireball spell gains an additional v0% of your bonus spell damage effects.

talentList.name: Dragon's Breath
talentList.description: Targets in a cone in front of the caster take 680 to 790 Fire damage and are Disoriented for 3 sec. Any direct damaging attack will revive targets. Turns off your attack when used.

talentList.name: Improved Frostbolt
talentList.description: Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Frostbite
talentList.description: Gives your Chill effects a v0% chance to freeze the target for 5 sec.

talentList.name: Piercing Ice
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Frost spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Frost Nova
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Frost Nova spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Blizzard
talentList.description: Adds a chill effect to your Blizzard spell. This effect lowers the target's movement speed by v0%. Lasts 1.50 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Cone of Cold
talentList.description: Increases the damage dealt by your Cone of Cold spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Permafrost
talentList.description: Increases the duration of your Chill effects by v0 sec and reduces the target's speed by an additional v1%.

talentList.name: Frost Channeling
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of your frost spells by v0% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by v1%.

talentList.name: Shatter
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by v0%.

talentList.name: Winter's Chill
talentList.description: Gives your Frost damage spells a v0% chance to apply the Winter's Chill effect, which increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by 2% for 15 sec. Stacks up to 5 times.

talentList.name: Icy Veins
talentList.description: Hastens your spellcasting, increasing spellcasting speed by 20% and gives you 100% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting. Lasts 20 sec.

talentList.name: Frost Warding
talentList.description: Increases the armor and resistances given by your Frost Armor and Ice Armor spells by v0%. In addition, gives your Frost Ward a v1% chance to reflect Frost spells and effects while active.

talentList.name: Ice Barrier
talentList.description: Instantly shields you, absorbing 1075 damage. Lasts 1 min. While the shield holds, spells will not be interrupted.

talentList.name: Cold Snap
talentList.description: When activated, this spell finishes the cooldown on all Frost spells you recently cast.

talentList.name: Ice Shards
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Arctic Reach
talentList.description: Increases the range of your Frostbolt and Blizzard spells and the radius of your Frost Nova and Cone of Cold spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Elemental Precision
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost and chance targets resist your Frost and Fire spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Frozen Core
talentList.description: Reduces the damage taken by Frost and Fire effects by v0%.

talentList.name: Ice Floes
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Cone of Cold, Cold Snap, Ice Barrier and Ice Block spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Arctic Winds
talentList.description: Increases all Frost damage you cause by v0% and reduces the chance melee and ranged attacks will hit you by v1%.

talentList.name: Empowered Frostbolt
talentList.description: Your Frostbolt spell gains an additional v0% of your bonus spell damage effects and an additional v1% chance to critically strike.

talentList.name: Summon Water Elemental
talentList.description: Summon a Water Elemental to fight for the caster for 45 sec.
